name: deg1cl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cun(cn0, csn(cmnf))))

stmt.origin: mdegcl(c0, c1, c2, c1o, c3, co(c1o, cmpl, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cun(cn0, csn(cmnf))))
-| wceq(c2, co(c1o, cmdg, c3))
-| wceq(co(c1o, cmpl, c3), co(c1o, cmpl, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cun(cn0, csn(cmnf))))
-| wceq(c2, co(c1o, cmdg, c3))
-| wceq(co(c1o, cmpl, c3), co(c1o, cmpl, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c3)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c2, co(c1o, cmdg, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cdg1, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cun(cn0, csn(cmnf))))
-| wceq(co(c1o, cmpl, c3), co(c1o, cmpl, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c3)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cdg1, c3))

body.origin: |- wceq(co(c1o, cmpl, c3), co(c1o, cmpl, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cun(cn0, csn(cmnf))))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c3)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cdg1, c3))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c3)))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cpl1, c3))
-| wceq(cfv(cps1, c3), cfv(cps1, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))
body.pretty:
⊢ c1 =(Base `(1o[mPoly]c3))
⊣ c4 =(Poly1 ` c3)
⊣ (PwSer1 ` c3)=(PwSer1 ` c3)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c4)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cun(cn0, csn(cmnf))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cdg1, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cpl1, c3))
-| wceq(cfv(cps1, c3), cfv(cps1, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cun(cn0, csn(cmnf))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cdg1, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cpl1, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))

comment: Sharp closure of univariate polynomial degree. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Mar-2015.)
